
```{r ShapeDescriptionExamples, echo=FALSE, fig.height=1.75, fig.width=6.0, fig.align="center", out.width='100%',fig.cap="Some common shapes of the distribution of qualitative data"}
par(mfrow = c(1, 4))
par(mar = c(2, 4.1, 3.5, 0.5),
    oma = c(0, 0, 0, 0))

blueTransparent <- rgb(0, 0, 1, 
                       alpha = 0.2, 
                       maxColorValue = 1)

set.seed(110110)

xx <- c( rchisq(300, 
                df = 2), 
         7,7,8,7,7,7,8,7,7,6)

hist( scales::rescale(xx, to = c(0, 5)), 
      xlab = "", 
      ylab = "Number of obs.",
      main = "Positively or\nright skewed",
      axes = FALSE,
      col = plot.colour, 
      las = 1)
axis(side = 2, 
     las = 1)
axis(side = 1,
     at = mean(xx),
     lwd = 0, # Suppress tick marks
     labels = "Values")
box()

xx <- c( rchisq(300, 
                df = 1), 
         2, 2, 1, 1, 2, 0, 0)

xx <- max(xx) - xx
hist( scales::rescale(xx, to = c(0, 5)), 
      xlab = "Values", ylab="Number of obs.",
      main = "Negatively or\nleft skewed",
      axes = FALSE,
      col = plot.colour, 
      las = 1)
axis(side = 2, 
     las = 1)
axis(side = 1,
     at = 2.5,
     lwd = 0, # Suppress tick marks
     labels = "Values")
box()

xx <- rnorm(500, mean=10)
hist( scales::rescale(xx, to = c(0, 10)), 
      xlab = "Values", ylab="Number of obs.",
      main = "Approx.\nsymmetric",
      axes = FALSE,
      col = plot.colour, 
      las = 1)
axis(side = 2, 
     las = 1)
axis(side = 1,
     at = 5,
     lwd = 0, # Suppress tick marks
     labels = "Values")
box()


###


xx1 <- rnorm(500,
             mean = 0, 
             sd = 1)
xx2 <- rnorm(250,
             mean = 4, 
             sd = 1)
xx <- c( xx1[xx1 > 0], xx2)


hist( scales::rescale(xx, to = c(0, 10)),  
      right = TRUE,
      axes = FALSE,
      col = plot.colour, 
      las = 1,
      xlab = "Values",
      ylab = "Number of obs.", 
      main = "Bimodal\ndistribution")
axis(side = 2, 
     las = 1)
axis(side = 1,
     at = 5,
     lwd = 0, # Suppress tick marks
     labels = "Values")
box()
```
